name: Bug Busterz X-Treme
description:
Oh no! Nasty bugs are everywhere! Better get Bustin'!

As the friendly neighbourhood centipede, you've taken it upon yourself to exterminate  everything what creeps and crawls. Armed with nothing but yourself, you'll fling your own segments at your enemies, only to frantically try to retrieve your lost limbs afterwards.

In this game your ammo count doubles as your health bar.  Every time you shoot , you lose a little bit of health. Likewise, if you get hit too much, you won't be able to shoot. But lucky you! You can go recollect any lost segments! That way you'll be able to bust even more bugs!

This game was made for the 109th Mini Jam, a bi-weekly, 72-hour game jam.  Seeing as this was our first game jam (and first proper game for that matter),  we weren't able to make everything we had planned for this game. Enemy variety is -quite- a bit lacking, and the game lacks a substantial amount of polish.  Worst of all, we weren't able to bust al the bugs in our code :(.

Due to some technical issues this game has been submitted late

How to play:

Shoot the spiders crawling around. Every once in a while, an anthill will appear, with extra fast ants scurrying out of them. Walk over one to close it. Any segments lying around can be picked up by touching 'em. 

You have to take wide turns or it won't respond well

Features:

  • A whole lot of bugs (both kinds)
  • X-tremely good pixel-art graphics
  • A pause menu
  • A bustin' good time

Controls:

Controller (Recommended):

Left Stick: Move and Aim

Any trigger shoulder button: Shoot

Start/Select: Start game and Pause

Keyboard (not recommended):

WASD/Arrows: Move and Aim

Spacebar/Shift/Enter: Shoot

Esc/P: Pause

Mouse (easy mode):

Left click: Move

Right click: Shoot
